text: "Downbound Train" is a 1984 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the fifth track from his seventh studio album Born in the U.S.A.. It was never released as a single and has become a mainstay on classic rock radio stations. Overall the song has been played at concerts over 130 times since 2008. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Heartland rock songs
title: Downbound Train
